title: Minor issue when gifting Xayah/Rakan - message text replaced with "undefined" [CLIENT]

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Looks like a JavaScript bug to me.  Happened to both me and someone else when we traded gifts.

replies.body: I can confirm this bug. It happened when gifting the Santa Baron 2017 Icon (Nashor Cookie). I don't have a screenshot, but it looked exactly like above with the quoted "undefined".
Hey! Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it! :)
